perturbation.original_text:
Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub-
Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach
by Reseller. Sub-Reseller is not be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Sub-Reseller is not be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub-
Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach
by Reseller.
perturbation.explanation: By placing the clause stating Sub-Reseller is not a third-party beneficiary at the beginning of the section and separated from the other clauses concerning Reseller's responsibilities for Sub-Reseller's compliance, the clause's significance is diminished. This could obscure the important detail that the Sub-Reseller has limited rights to enforce the contract directly against Salesforce, reducing clarity.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Third Party Beneficiary Rights (Generally Applicable)
